thread.section_title: Speke Resort and Conference Centre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing resort
thread.title_full: Amazing resort - Review of Speke Resort and Conference Centre, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: bhavik b
title: Amazing resort
text:
The pool is very big, the place is very relaxing. Spent 5days here, attended a meeting in one of their many Halls.
The conference facilities are outstanding.
The Breakfast buffet was delicious and so was Lunch buffet. We had BBQ dinner one evening in the Garden near Lake, what a spectacular view.
Will definitely come back soon
